text: Saleha mhanale, he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Bare he sanga, jara mi apalya palanakartyatarphe ekhadya khasa pramanavara asela ani tyane mala apalya javaluna daya-krpa pradana keli asela, maga mi jara tyaci avajna keli tara asa kona ahe, jo tyacyasamora majhi madata karela? Tumhi tara majhya nukasanataca bhara takata ahata
